title: Attempting A World Record With Darren Cioffi
itunes:title: Attempting A World Record With Darren Cioffi
description:
This week on the #1 Cigar Podcast, the boys attempt to set a world record with a cigar measuring 5.25 x 42. They’ll be joined by the current record holder Darren Cioffi of Principle Cigars.

In the second hour, at least Dave will light up a United Cigar Churchill from The Cigar Authority Care Package.

We also step into the Asylum with Mr. Jonathan, get Debonaire with Chuck Morrison, and get the latest Cigar News from Barry.
